marker.label: Island Grill
marker.comment: Great location, friendly, and as unpretentious a bar and restaurant as can possibly be. Live music too, and docking for boats.

marker.label: Kingston Yacht Club
marker.comment: Dining room is open to the public for lunch

marker.label: River Mill
marker.comment: Despite appearances, it's not really accessible by boat.

marker.label: Radisson Hotel Kingston Harbourfront
marker.comment: Top floor restaurant has a beautiful panorama.
